newsText: Cyprus: Parliament debated coastal resilience funding after storm-damage assessments. Greece: Energy regulator approved a phased interconnector reliability plan. World: Trade ministers signaled progress on digital customs standards, while inflation prints remained mixed across major economies. Sources: Reuters, Financial Times, Kathimerini, Cyprus Mail.
techText: Computer Science: New paper benchmarks retrieval-augmented reasoning on noisy datasets. Programming: Type-safe tooling updates emphasize faster builds and stricter lint defaults. AI/LLMs: Model providers released lower-latency inference tiers with tighter context controls. Engineering: Platform teams report migration patterns from monolith services to event-first workflows. Sources: arXiv, GitHub changelogs, vendor blogs, InfoQ.
